meanings.definition: Having a strong or offensive odor.
meanings.sent1: The garbage left in the sun became funky.
meanings.sent2: The old socks in the gym bag were getting funky.
meanings.sent3: The funky smell from the cheese made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The funky stench in the room was unbearable.
meanings.sent5: The funky aroma lingered in the kitchen for hours.

meanings.definition: Cool, stylish, or fashionable in an unconventional way.
meanings.sent1: Her funky hat caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The band had a funky style that stood out.
meanings.sent3: He thought his funky socks were a fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: The funky outfit she wore was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent5: The funky jacket added a unique touch to his look.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of funk music.
meanings.sent1: The funky beat of the song got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent2: The band played a funky tune that got the crowd moving.
meanings.sent3: She loved the funky rhythm of the music.
meanings.sent4: The funky bass line added groove to the song.
meanings.sent5: The funky sound of the guitar was infectious.
